FuncDef:
The ospf maxage-lsa auto-protect disable command disables master/slave board switching triggered by abnormal OSPF LSA aging.
The undo ospf maxage-lsa auto-protect disable command enables master/slave board switching triggered by abnormal OSPF LSA aging. The ospf maxage-lsa auto-protect disable command disables master/slave board switching triggered by abnormal OSPF LSA aging. The undo ospf maxage-lsa auto-protect disable command enables master/slave board switching triggered by abnormal OSPF LSA aging. By default, master/slave board switching triggered by abnormal OSPF LSA aging is enabled.
